title: The gentlemans calling
author: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.
notes: First edition? One of two editions published in the same year.
Other editions attribute this to the author of The whole duty of man [Richard Allestree].
Illustrated t.p., engraved; added illustrated t.p., engraved.
Prefatory letter signed: H.H. [i.e. Humphrey Henchman]
Variously attributed to Lady Dorothy Pakington, Richard Sterne, Abp. of York, John Fell, Bp. of Oxford, Humphrey Henchman, and others. cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
